metadata.title: CVE-2019-14809 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: net/url in Go before 1.11.13 and 1.12.x before 1.12.8 mishandles malformedhosts in URLs, leading to an authorization bypass in some applications.This is related to a Host field with a suffix appearing in neitherHostname() nor Port(), and is related to a non-numeric port number. Forexample, an attacker can compose a crafted javascript:// URL that resultsin a hostname of google.com.

criterions.comment: golang-1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
golang-1.10: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
